price: 5. And the cattle, He has created them for you; in them there is warmth (warm clothing), and numerous benefits, and of them you eat.
arabic: وَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمَ خَلَقَهَاۖ لَكُمۡ فِيهَا دِفۡءٞ وَمَنَٰفِعُ وَمِنۡهَا تَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: wal-anʿāma khalaqahā lakum fīhā dif'on wamanāfiʿu wamin'hā takulūna
